event.title: Rachel Davies on Modern XP
event.description:
Once upon a time XP was new and exciting. Scrum has long since become the mainstream approach to Agile. Nowadays it seems that Agile is more about project management than software development. Teams at Unruly still use XP and we’ve continued to evolve our practice. Modern XP is not Scrum with a smattering of TDD. XP values and principles pervade our whole approach to product development. Come to this talk to hear how teams at Unruly deliver continuous value with XP.

About our speaker:

Rachel Davies coaches product development teams at Unruly in London. She is co-author of “Agile Coaching” and an invited speaker at industry events around the globe. Her mission is to create workplaces where developers enjoy delivering valuable software. Rachel is a strong advocate of modern XP approaches and currently organises Extreme Programmers London meet-up. @rachelcdavies on Twitter
